Title: ChavasseDance&Performance- performance residency Italia!
Question: You're going to Italy... how tough can that be????
Answer: Well yeah sure, I hear ya, but we will be working really hard. We rarely get a chance to get together to rehearse and create. This is an amazing opportunity, and although it happens to be in a beautiful part of Italy, we'd be happy to get to work on this project anywhere! Trust me.
